channel.title: Crashing in Unforseen Consequences
channel.description: Title pretty much says it all. At the first loading screen after finding the crowbar, the game just crashes. I've included my crash report with this post if it can be of any use. Thank you for the support. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_19T13_48_14C0.mdmp (95 KB)
